Text.Page:
Why are you looking at me in such terror?
I'm not afraid of heights!
"Are you sure?"

I may be an expert in the maintenance of machines,
but I'm a little afraid of using them myself.

Whatever, let's do this!
Zolyn is waiting!

You jump from the airship to Arx Umbra and attack the Parthian base. You come across a dying Parthian who identifies himself as Hayden. He reveals to you that he and his comrades were being controlled by black magic and that they didn't intentionally betray Rhodos. With his last breath, he entrusts you with a souvenir to give to Rhodos.

When you're in the middle of the enemy formations, drop down.

May Kaia grant you victory!

, come here, quick!

He's still alive! And he's trying to say something!
Road? What road? Oh! Rhodos! He's looking for Rhodos!"I'll talk to him."

Mind…clear. Tell Rhodos…

We're not servants of the archdevas; we're slaves."What do you mean?"

Their magic…it twisted our minds. Bound us to them.

Tell Rhodos to free us…and avenge me."Be at peace."
Well fought, <PCNAME>! You got through!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I was asked to give this to you."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

It's Jitt's dagger!
Where did you get this? Where is he?
